item.description:
Road to Nashville....A Country Celebration/w The Starliners Entertainment Charge: $12 Date: November-05-2011 Time: 6:45 PM Description: Our new show is a step out of our usual box as we prepare for "Road to Nashville..A Country Celebration".American Idol has made some Country singers with Carrie Underwood & Scotty McCreery. We are hoping to go down memory lane a bit with some country standards and then of course bring it home with Big & Rich and some songs of today. Featuring songs that made Shania Twain, Reba McEntire,Loretta Lynn, Kenny Rogers, Tammy Wynette, John Denver, Johnny & June Cash,Conway Twitty, Glen Campbell, Patsy Cline, Buck Owens to name a few into the Country Legends of today. The Starliners will deliver as they always do a smashing,fun-filled evening that is always remembered and that always brings our patrons coming back show after show. Reserve early by calling 781-297-SHOW(7469.)Show charge is $12.00 per person PLUS the cost of your dinner entree from $12.95.Ideal for all special occassions or just a night out for loads of fun! Banquet Menu available for larger groups.

June J. will be the event organizer - please contact her for a reservation
item.name: Road to Nashville....A Country Celebration - (There is an ELEVATOR!)
